item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: About me My name is Julien Gustin I am 22 and I am currently pursuing master studies in Data Science at @Uliege in Belgium. I am passionate about AI and more mostly about deep learning, during my free time I like photographie, traveling, hiking and climbing. Education MSc. in Data Science | University of Liege 2021 - 2023 BSc. in Computer Science | University of Liege 2018 - 2021 Projects Image colorization Given a grayscale image, we automatically colorize it without any user input.
